title: Excel Beginner? Start Here
text:
Hide / Unhide Columns and Rows 
Quickly hide columns and rows containing data that can't be removed, Doing so can make it easier to focus on other, important areas of the worksheet. And it's easy to bring them back once you need to see the hidden data again. Entering the Date 
Use a keyboard shortcut to quickly enter the current date. 
Or, if you would prefer to have the date update to the current date every time the worksheet is opened, use the TODAY function instead. 
Seven tips on best practices for entering data into a worksheet Including: planning the worksheet; entering headings and data units; protecting worksheet formulas.
